name: B.O.B. - Blue on Blue
description:
2 player competitive local shooter game

Bob the lemming is nominated for the Darwin Award. At the award ceremony, his desire to end his life kicks in - but his bodyguard Ivan tries to protect him!

Developed during https://www.jamisland.net/ GameJam with the topic "Darwin Award"

  • Sina Pross
  • Johannes Jöbstl
  • Konstantin Wilke
  • Fabian Peer
  • Rene Baumgartner
